title: Margot Robbie and Bombshell co-star Nicole match in black at Elle's Women In Hollywood event
text:
Margot Robbie's upcoming film Bombshell is already receiving Oscar buzz, with little more than a minute-and-a-half-long teaser available to the public.

She joined her co-star Nicole Kidman at Elle's Women in Hollywood party Monday at The Four Seasons in Los Angeles.

Robbie was dressed to kill in black, which appeared to be the dress code for the star-studded event.

Women in Hollywood: Margot Robbie joined her Bombshell co-star Nicole Kidman at Elle's Women in Hollywood party Monday at The Four Seasons in Los Angeles

She donned a shimmering black velvet sweater as she arrived at the party, which also featured a black carpet and black backdrop.

The top was tucked into a floor-length black satin skirt with a matching cummerbund.

A pair of black strappy stilettos peaked out from the bottom, revealing a fresh black pedicure with a matching manicure.

Kidman stunned on the black carpet in a blank ankle-length double-breasted tuxedo jacket.

A knee-high leg slit showed off her toned legs in a pair of black lace pointed stilettos with diamond embellishments.

She accessorized with a matching diamond choker, earrings and rings on both hands.

Kidman is one of 10 women to be featured in the Elle Women in Hollywood issue, for which she's featured on one of 10 individual covers.

She and Robbie have recently been promoting Bombshell, which premieres December 20.

The co-stars shared a hug as they reunited on the black carpet at the exclusive gathering.

They join Charlize Theron in the film, which recounts the sexual misconduct claims brought against Roger Ailes.

Robbie plays a composite character, while Theron plays Megyn Kelly and Kidman portrays Gretchen Carlson.
